DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to document the clinical effects of bupropion and citalopram in a single subject with Friedreich Ataxia.
DOC.brief_title: An Objective Double-blind Evaluation of Bupropion and Citalopram in an Individual With Friedreich Ataxia
DOC.detailed_description: This is a double blind study with a single subject to objectively document the clinical effects of bupropion and citalopram in a single patient with Friedreich Ataxia (FA), whose disorder symptoms have improved with the use of these medications.
DOC.criteria: Friedreich Ataxia Unable to provide Informed Consent
